name: The Knight and The Maiden [Demo]
description:
Something is amiss in the Kingdom of Arcenia and it is the job of guardsman Laurence to fix what has gone wrong.

The Knight and The Maiden is a turn-based RPG made using RPG Maker MV and a few plugins. The game is currently unfinished.

Credits: Aaron Krogh - Used his music [The pack I used can be found here.]
